description:
NIVEA Invisible Black & White Clear Anti-Perspirant Aerosol Deodorant offers reliable 48 hour protection while gently caring for your skin. Enjoy invisible protection with our anti-stain technology - no white marks on black clothes or yellow stains on white.

Keep your black clothes black and white clothes white with NIVEA Invisible Black & White Clear Anti-Perspirant Aerosol Deodorant. The first 48-hour antiperspirant deodorant that provides anti-yellow sweat stain protection and guards against white marks on your black clothes. Our unique formula with a delicate "clear" fragrance protects you and your favourite clothes. Our deodorant uses a technology with a specific anti-staining compound. The active ingredients protect textile fibres before the stain components can reach and penetrate them. Then with the use of aluminium salts that are dissolved in an emulsion and coated with masking oils, the white residue sometimes left by deodorants is invisible on clothing. It contains no ethylalcohol and is dermatologically proven for skin tolerance.

1Lasting Protection: 48H anti-perspirant protection

25 in 1: protection against odour, sweat, stains, residues and irritation

3Clothing Protection: White mark protection on black clothing

4Anti-Staining: no yellow marks on white clothing

5Skin Safe: No ethyl alcohol

6Suitable for all skin types: Skin tolerance dermatologically proven

White mark protection on black clothing & anti-yellow staining on white clothing
name: Nivea Black & White Invisible Clear Aerosol Deodorant Twin Pack 250ml x 2 pack
